name: Sword
description: a classic yet deadly-looking sword. It glints, as if mocking its slain enemies

target_responses.take: The sword is well-balanced. Its maker speaks to you through it, warning you of the deathly power it hold, expressing himself through sheer emotion, lest words sully the message's import.
target_responses.break: A blade of this making cannot be broken by one such as you. HA!
